title: sagybtc
author: sagybtc
content: Hello  There !     I am Santosh CEO of Cryptochrome.org (CHM ) , https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/cryptochrome  Cryptochrome is Farming and Staking Service provider . We wanted to add new Product and partnership to project .CHM is Listed on Probit , Hotbit , Dex trade. Looking for Private Investors' and Partners to build , liquidity addition and Market making .For More Details Pm . Thank You !

comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: Maybe try to upgrade your account to copper member so it would let you post images first (Copper Member).Then create a good ANN thread promoting your website and include all the information, try to get idea from this board:  Announcements (Altcoins)You can also boost your traffic or advertise your project through bounty campaign and other promotional campaign.

comments.author: sagybtc
comments.body: Quote from: joeperry on December 03, 2022, 04:30:46 AMMaybe try to upgrade your account to copper member so it would let you post images first (Copper Member).Then create a good ANN thread promoting your website and include all the information, try to get idea from this board:  Announcements (Altcoins)You can also boost your traffic or advertise your project through bounty campaign and other promotional campaign.Thank You For Your valuable feedback . Working on it .

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: Quote from: joeperry on December 03, 2022, 04:30:46 AMMaybe try to upgrade your account to copper member so it would let you post images first (Copper Member). op is already a je member so I don't think there is much need to buy a copper member to support images . He can continue his desired work through this account as you said. And maybe op can meet some potential users from this forum who are willing to work as his partner or invest in his project. But it is not guaranteed that it will work completely.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: coinerer on December 03, 2022, 05:53:32 PMQuote from: joeperry on December 03, 2022, 04:30:46 AMMaybe try to upgrade your account to copper member so it would let you post images first (Copper Member). op is already a je member so I don't think there is much need to buy a copper member to support images . He can continue his desired work through this account as you said. And maybe op can meet some potential users from this forum who are willing to work as his partner or invest in his project. But it is not guaranteed that it will work completely.Yes and with the state of the market right now, maybe there are investors that are willing to partake in this kind of partnership.But hey, we really don't know, maybe he can find a good person in this community that is ready and just waiting for a project like this one.So good luck, maybe the OP just need to make it professional though, with the way he post or some good visualizations, maybe he can convinced someone.
